title: Free Speech isn't for what you agree with. The Warren Markowitz Show, Politically Inccorrect, 10/21/17
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. America,the marketplace of free ideas, is rapidly becoming a failed experiment on the altar of social justice and equality. From the famed halls of Berkely where the movement began we are witnessing the rise of racism, hate speech, and ant--? movements. Join me as I take a look at the current events that are creating a world that is destined for self destruction. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com (wrm.podomatic.com), Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
